summary: Fixed Himalaya email client reply/forward/send errors by updating CLI command syntax for himalaya v1.1.0. Updated send_email() to use 'message send' with stdin piping, replaced non-existent 'envelope get' with 'message read' in get_email_by_id(), and added parse_message_read_result() helper for extracting email data.

artifacts.summary: Updated send_email(), get_email_by_id(), and added parse_message_read_result() helper
Updated command detection for message send/move/delete

completion_data.completion_summary: Fixed Himalaya email client integration for himalaya CLI v1.1.0. Updated send_email() to use 'message send' command with stdin piping, replaced non-existent 'envelope get' with 'message read' in get_email_by_id(), and added parse_message_read_result() helper to extract email data for reply/forward operations.
